job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Engineering at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Engineering at Brex is about building systems that scale with speed and intention. Our teams span Software, Data, Security, and IT, and operate with high autonomy and deep collaboration. We tackle hard technical problems, own our outcomes, and push for excellence at every level — from architecture to deployment. It’s an environment where engineering is a craft, and builders become leaders.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As a Full-Stack Senior Software Engineer on our Users team, you will work across the entire Brex stack to build solutions that manage user lifecycles and integrate with HRIS systems - core to support all Brex products and critical for maintaining enterprise onboarding processes. You will have the opportunity to learn and push the frontier of providing the best enterprise onboarding processes and supporting a large, high-performing engineering team.&amp;nbsp; You’ll be encouraged to be metric and data-driven and to think creatively to help Brex scale and get prepared for the new markets we are about to enter.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;We’re looking for folks with not only an interest in building products and tools but also in leading multi-functional projects with lots of moving pieces. In this role, you’ll have the opportunity to drive direct business impact and shape our long-term technical vision with a high-quality bar.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in the office - Monday, Wednesday, and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work with engineers across the company to build new features and products end-to-end&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own problems end-to-end, thinking through everything from user experience, data models, scalability, operability and ongoing metrics.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Provide technical leadership to team by driving roadmap direction, architectural design and mentorship&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work side-by-side with user-facing teams (Sales, Support) to best understand the needs of our customers.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Tune and polish features to a high degree of excellence.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Identify and implement reliability and performance improvements&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Uphold our high engineering standards and bring consistency to the codebases, infrastructure, and processes you will encounter&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;8+ years of professional experience with a focus on frontend development with React alongside designing, developing, and deploying full-stack products&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience developing software for the Web platform, including cross-browser compatibility&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in architecting, developing, and testing client-side code end-to-end&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building and designing scalable backend systems&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Platform or Full-Stack development experience preferably in Kotlin(Java, Scala and Groovy are also acceptable)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience with modern technologies and tools like ES6+, React, Typescript, GraphQL &amp;amp; Webpack&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with SQL or NoSQL databases&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Kubernetes familiarity&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience Tech Leading projects across a group of engineers&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience collaborating with cross-functional stakeholders and specialists in product, design, and operations&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in Tech Leading teams&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience driving initiatives at a broader level across an organization or company&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience running in-product experiments, A/B testing&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience and interest in leveraging AI developer tools&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Effective writing skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Track record of identifying and fixing problems.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong data-stringify-type=&quot;bold&quot;&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $192,000 - $240,000. However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors, including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt; &lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Senior Software Engineer, Full-Stack

job_city: New York, New York, United States
job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Engineering at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Engineering at Brex is about building systems that scale with speed and intention. Our teams span Software, Data, Security, and IT, and operate with high autonomy and deep collaboration. We tackle hard technical problems, own our outcomes, and push for excellence at every level — from architecture to deployment. It’s an environment where engineering is a craft, and builders become leaders.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As an engineer at Brex, you will help develop new products from concept to launch, whether for a 5-person startup or a 5,000-person-strong enterprise. We’re looking for folks with an interest in building products and tools, and who are comfortable in dealing with lots of moving pieces. You’ll be building customer-facing products that will drive direct business impact and shape our long-term technical vision with a high-quality bar. You&#39;ll have the opportunity to learn and push the frontier of providing the best financial software experience to help companies grow. You’ll be encouraged to be metric and data-driven and to think creatively to help Brex scale and get prepared for the new markets we are about to enter.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our New York Office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require 3 days per week in the office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own functionality and scalability features by taking responsibility from inception to deployment.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Be responsible for full software development lifecycle - design, development, testing, operating in production&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Uphold our high engineering standards and bring consistency to the codebases, infrastructure, and processes you will encounter.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;7+ years of professional experience in a software engineering role or equivalent experience&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building and designing scalable backend systems&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with SQL or NoSQL databases&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with backend programming languages (Java, Kotlin, Python)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Familiarity with software engineering development cycles&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to hold yourself and the team to high standards&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong communication and interpersonal skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li data-stringify-indent=&quot;0&quot; data-stringify-border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;English proficiency/fluency, both written and speaking (note: interviews will be conducted in English)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience collaborating with experts in product, design, and operations.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Familiarity with functional programming languages&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience driving initiatives at a broader level across an organization or company&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong writing skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proactive approach&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Engineering at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Engineering at Brex is about building systems that scale with speed and intention. Our teams span Software, Data, Security, and IT, and operate with high autonomy and deep collaboration. We tackle hard technical problems, own our outcomes, and push for excellence at every level — from architecture to deployment. It’s an environment where engineering is a craft, and builders become leaders.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As an engineer at Brex, you will help develop new products from concept to launch, whether for a 5-person startup or a 5,000-person-strong enterprise. We’re looking for folks with an interest in building products and tools, and who are comfortable in dealing with lots of moving pieces. You’ll be building customer-facing products that will drive direct business impact and shape our long-term technical vision with a high-quality bar. You&#39;ll have the opportunity to learn and push the frontier of providing the best financial software experience to help companies grow. You’ll be encouraged to be metric and data-driven and to think creatively to help Brex scale and get prepared for the new markets we are about to enter.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco Office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require 3 days per week in the office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Collaborate with engineers across the company to build new features and products end-to-end.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work alongside user-facing teams like Sales and Support to deeply understand our customers&#39; needs.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Design and implement solutions to improve our customers&#39; banking experiences.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own problems end-to-end, from user experience and data models to scalability, operability, and ongoing metrics.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Tune and polish features to a high degree of excellence.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;4+ years of professional experience designing, developing, and deploying full-stack applications.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience architecting, developing, and testing client-side code end-to-end.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;A high bar for engineering standards and a willingness to learn.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;This role will be based in either New York, San Francisco, or our Seattle office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $152,000 - $190,000 USD. However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. We tackle hard technical problems, own our outcomes, and push for excellence at every level — from architecture to deployment. It’s an environment where engineering is a craft, and builders become leaders.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As an engineer at Brex, you will help develop new products from concept to launch, whether for a 5-person startup or a 5,000-person-strong enterprise. You’ll be building customer-facing products that will drive direct business impact and shape our long-term technical vision with a high-quality bar. You&#39;ll have the opportunity to learn and push the frontier of providing the best financial software experience to help companies grow. You’ll be encouraged to be metric and data-driven and to think creatively to help Brex scale and get prepared for the new markets we are about to enter.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Seattle Office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $152,000 - $190,000 USD. However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Design at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Design at Brex creates the experiences that make complex systems feel effortless through thoughtful, scalable design. Whether crafting interfaces, shaping product strategy, or harnessing AI to empower our users, we obsess over quality and clarity. This is a team where creativity meets high craft, and where designers grow by building for ambitious customers.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Brex is looking for a Staff brand designer to join the Design team, a cross-disciplinary group of creatives including product designers, brand designers, content design, operations, and marketing strategists. Our team’s mission is to build a category-defining brand and meaningfully move key business metrics by delivering world-class creative.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Your role will be to contribute to direction and execute a variety of creative projects across marketing collateral, digital experiences, out-of-home, communications, environmental, and more. This is a collaborative role that will require you to work closely with marketing leaders, Web and Product teams, and the rest of the team to ship effective brand marketing projects and campaigns. You are a creative problem solver who can think strategically but also loves getting into the details to ensure final creative is fine-tuned and perfected down to the pixel.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco, Seattle, or New York office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;br&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Collaborate and provide feedback to external creative agencies and vendors&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Think outside of the box and partner to push brand narrative and innovation forward&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Contribute to the growth and scale of the design team through referrals, interviewing, and contributing to processes&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Collaborate closely and c&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;learly articulate design decisions to a vast set of partners including &lt;/span&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;multidisciplinary creatives on the Brand Studio team and with our internal partners across Marketing and Product&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Provide cross-org input that will help shape planning and strategy&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Deliver and solicit feedback to continually improve the Brex brand and raise the quality and craftsmanship of our output; maintaining brand guidelines and a strong attention to detail&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a talent for detailed articulations of strategy and process&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience developing creative brand and acquisition campaigns, and collaborating with marketing organizations&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Strong ability to craft a clear narrative and paint a vision that aligns teams&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Appetite for problem-solving and thrives in multifaceted, fast-paced environments&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Portfolio demonstrating ability to implement a combination of strategic, conceptual, and design skills crafting original, persuasive, and visually compelling work&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Motion Design, Video, or Illustration experience&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;7+ years of design/art direction experience&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working with tools including but not limited to Figma, Jira, Looker, Slack, Google Apps, Salesforce, Chrome Console&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience designing for web, email, offline media, and video&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience art directing photographers/videographers, illustrators, or 3D designers&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working on products in both B2B and B2C companies&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $187,00 - $234,000.&amp;nbsp; However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Staff Brand Designer

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Design at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Design at Brex creates the experiences that make complex systems feel effortless through thoughtful, scalable design. Whether crafting interfaces, shaping product strategy, or harnessing AI to empower our users, we obsess over quality and clarity. This is a team where creativity meets high craft, and where designers grow by building for ambitious customers.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Brex is looking for a Staff brand designer to join the Design team, a cross-disciplinary group of creatives including product designers, brand designers, content design, operations, and marketing strategists. Our team’s mission is to build a category-defining brand and meaningfully move key business metrics by delivering world-class creative.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Your role will be to contribute to direction and execute a variety of creative projects across marketing collateral, digital experiences, out-of-home, communications, environmental, and more. This is a collaborative role that will require you to work closely with marketing leaders, Web and Product teams, and the rest of the team to ship effective brand marketing projects and campaigns. You are a creative problem solver who can think strategically but also loves getting into the details to ensure final creative is fine-tuned and perfected down to the pixel.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco, Seattle, or New York office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;br&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Create high-impact, responsive web experiences from wireframes to high-fidelity prototypes, balancing clarity, conversion, and brand expression.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Drive the evolution of Brex’s web design system and Figma component libraries, ensuring scalability and consistency.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Collaborate with engineers to translate design into production, writing detailed specs, QA’ing builds, and speaking fluently in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Push creative boundaries with code, experimenting with interactive experiences using WebGL/Three.js, Canvas, GSAP, or p5.js.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Have strong design taste and clear judgment. Be able to show work, get decisions made, and turn interactive ideas into business impact through excellent execution.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;8+ years of experience in interactive or digital design roles.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Expert in Figma for systems, components, and prototyping.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Comfortable working in code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and collaborating closely with engineers.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience with modern interactive tools (Framer, Spline, WebGL/Three.js, GSAP, or similar).&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Familiarity with headless CMS workflows (Sanity or similar) to design within real content structures.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong eye for typography, layout, motion, and visual hierarchy.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Portfolio of shipped interactive work that demonstrates taste, technical fluency, and business impact.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Background working with creative agencies or in-house teams for consumer-facing brands.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Understanding of accessibility standards for motion and interactivity.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Track record of delivering award-winning or high-impact web experiences.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $187,00 - $234,000.&amp;nbsp; However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Staff Brand Designer, Interactive

job_city: New York, New York, United States
job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Design at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Design at Brex creates the experiences that make complex systems feel effortless through thoughtful, scalable design. Whether crafting interfaces, shaping product strategy, or harnessing AI to empower our users, we obsess over quality and clarity. This is a team where creativity meets high craft, and where designers grow by building for ambitious customers.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;You will work with Product and Engineering teams to successfully communicate, evolve, and execute a strong product design standard that showcases Brex as a leader in financial innovation. You are a crucial component of our company’s growth and product launches through your contributions to short and long-term strategic direction, creating and maintaining high visual standards and a strong focus on user needs. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;You have an owner’s mentality, taking pride in your work and in your team’s work, and view what you do as a part-owner and builder of Brex.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco or New York office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;br&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Use creative thinking toward establishing and executing on the vision for the team initiatives&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Challenge the status quo, push innovation, and inspire people toward a unified outcome&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Efficiently execute to ship products that deliver impact for our business and customers&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Partner with the leadership team to successfully communicate concisely across the team and influence product and design outcomes&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Work across the entire business stack and make an impact at different stages of the product: building vision &amp;amp; strategy, ensuring all the loose ends are tied up when executing, and making sure the operational components to support onboarding are in place, not just the product&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Contribute toward growing and scaling design across the broader company and within the Design org&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Push forward and maintain a high design bar and level of execution &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Work&lt;/span&gt; closely with stakeholders across the organization, p&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;artnering with Engineering, Product, Operations, and Data teams to define and launch new products and features&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a talent for detailed articulations of strategy, process, and leading cross-functional meetings to align teams&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working cross-functionally with engineering, marketing, design, and product management teams&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Strong ability to craft a clear narrative and paint a vision that communicates and aligns teams&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Passion for team building and development&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;10+ years of experience as a product designer&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience building customer-facing products from 0 to 1&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working with tools including but not limited to Figma, Jira, Looker, Slack, Google Apps, Salesforce, Chrome Console&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working on products in both B2B and B2C companies&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience writing/editing/contributing to documentation, training materials, and help articles to support product launches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $240,000 - $300,000.&amp;nbsp; However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

&lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Work across the entire business stack and make an impact at different stages of the product: building vision &amp;amp; strategy, ensuring all the loose ends are tied up when executing, and making sure the operational components to support onboarding are in place, not just the product&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Contribute toward growing and scaling design across the broader company and within the Design org&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Push forward and maintain a high design bar and level of execution &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Work&lt;/span&gt; closely with stakeholders across the organization, p&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;artnering with Engineering, Product, Operations, and Data teams to define and launch new products and features&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a talent for detailed articulations of strategy, process, and leading cross-functional meetings to align teams&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working cross-functionally with engineering, marketing, design, and product management teams&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Strong ability to craft a clear narrative and paint a vision that communicates and aligns teams&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Passion for team building and development&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;10+ years of experience as a product designer&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience building customer-facing products from 0 to 1&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working with tools including but not limited to Figma, Jira, Looker, Slack, Google Apps, Salesforce, Chrome Console&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience working on products in both B2B and B2C companies&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Experience writing/editing/contributing to documentation, training materials, and help articles to support product launches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $240,000 - $300,000.&amp;nbsp; However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Staff Product Designer

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sales at Brex&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;Sales is the growth engine at Brex. We bring in new customers, expand existing relationships, and drive the company’s bottom line. With unlimited territories and uncapped opportunity, your ambition sets the ceiling. We win together, celebrate often, and reward performance. If you want to sell a category-defining product with real ownership, this is your team.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;As a Startups Account Executive, you will be working with founders, co-founders, C-Suite Executives, controllers, and VP’s of Finance to continue generating net-new revenue and growing the Brex brand. You will manage a full pipeline and ensure success on every level.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco or New York City office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Close net new business with a focus on professionally funded companies&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Become trusted account advisors by managing accounts and being strategic in both inbound and outbound sales&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Engage with businesses at all points of the sales cycle - including prospecting, product demonstrations, onboarding, and close.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Develop strategic plans on how to close more companies and generate more revenue&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Focus on self-development with daily training and enablement&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work closely with Startups Ambassadors to bring in referrals&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;18+ months of Outbound B2B SaaS Sales experience&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;6+ months of B2B SaaS closing experience&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Excels in conversations with c-suite executive decision makers&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience carrying quota&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Consistently in the top 10% of the stack ranking&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proven track record of hitting and exceeding quotas&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Graduate of a 4 year university&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;The expected OTE range for this role is USD $122,026 - $152,533. The starting wage will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. The OTE figure listed here includes base salary and commissions, which may or may not be earned depending on performance.&amp;nbsp; Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Startups Account Executive
